overview: In Athens, a pampered girl walks with a friend of hers, Raouf, who makes free trips to the capital. She discovers that she is in real trouble. Rauf stole her jewelry on the night of her wedding, the young man who left Egypt for her. Hamdi Suleiman, who asked him to represent her husband in front of her uncle and partner Tariq, lost the trick in searching for Raouf. Hamdi agrees for a sum of money and they are on their way back. Growing love between them, and know his way to the heart and change alienation, to the language of happiness,
title: مع حبى واشواقى
